name: 100 days
description:
100 days is a game that allows you to immerse yourself in the harsh world of one island, where you have to survive for 100 days. Build, explore the island and find secrets.
Physical crafts make the game world unique.
This is the alpha version of the game, as the planned features will be available later.

Alpha_250721 features:
  • AI
  • Construction system
  • Crafting
  • Underwater world
  • Instant game saving
